summary: This document is a property details and comparables report for a single-family residential property in New York, NY, generated by Black Knight Financial Technology Solutions. It details the ownership, valuation, and characteristics of the subject property and provides comparable sales data for the surrounding area. The report appears to be a standard real estate assessment document. This document is a compilation of real estate reports (Transaction History, Aerial Map, Foreclosure Activity, Demographics, Nearby Neighbors, Public Schools) for a subject property in New York, NY 10021. It includes comparable property sales data and detailed neighborhood information, likely compiled for due diligence or valuation purposes related to a property transaction. This document is a private schools report generated on June 27, 2019, listing up to 15 private schools closest to a subject property located at an unspecified address in New York, NY 10021-4102. The report provides detailed information on each school, including name, address, grades offered, gender, affiliation, student-teacher ratios, and enrollment numbers by grade. It appears to be a standard real estate or property assessment report, likely used for valuation or market analysis, and contains a disclaimer about the accuracy and permitted uses of the information.

keyFacts: The subject property is a single-family residential property located in New York, NY 10021-4102, with an estimated current market value of $77,478,000 as of June 27, 2019.
The property was purchased on December 23, 2011, for $31,950,000, as indicated in the comparables report.
The property is a large residence with 18,814 square feet of living area, built in 1910, with 6 stories.
The report lists 17 comparable property sales in the surrounding area from 2018 and 2019, with sale prices ranging from $565,000 to $31,950,000.
The document is a standard real estate valuation report and contains no direct references to individuals involved in the Epstein case.
The reports were generated on June 27, 2019, for a single-family residential property in the Upper East Side of Manhattan (NY 10021).
Comparable property sales data shows high-value transactions in the area, including an $11.125 million multi-family sale in June 2019 and a $1.825 million condo sale in October 2018.
The subject property itself was sold on December 23, 2011, with the deed recorded on January 10, 2012.
The neighborhood demographics indicate a wealthy area with a median household income over $118,000 and a high household income centile (98th nationally).
The reports include detailed information on nearby properties, public schools, and foreclosure activity, suggesting a comprehensive real estate due diligence package.
The report is dated June 27, 2019, and lists private schools within approximately 0.5 miles of a subject property in the 10021 zip code of New York, NY.
The subject property is described as 'Single Family Residential' and is located in New York County.

The report includes 15 schools, with details such as grades offered, gender (all-female, all-male, coed), religious affiliation (Roman Catholic, Jewish, Christian, nonsectarian), student-teacher ratios, and enrollment numbers by grade.

A disclaimer states the report is provided 'as is' without warranties, the information is from public records and not independently verified, and it cannot be used for credit/insurance eligibility or to certify real estate ownership.
The report is copyrighted by Black Knight Financial Technology Solutions, LLC, indicating it is a commercial property data product.
